content: Take the main path first to find a few enemies up ahead, and an open shack on the right where the dim glow of another green Wisp can be seen. Be wary, as there's another Puppet Spider hiding in the shadows waiting for you to try and absorb the spirit!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Take the main path first to find a few enemies up ahead, and an open shack on the right where the dim glow of another green Wisp can be seen. Be wary, as there's another Puppet Spider hiding in the shadows waiting for you to try and absorb the spirit!
